traits.name: Two Heads
entries: The two-headed owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

traits.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the owlbear's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The two-headed owlbear makes three attacks: two with its beaks and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage.
